messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics]Rue's book
messages.msgSnippet: Yes, Rue s book is available at www.freechild.info; I just ordered 2 more to share--and that won t be enough.  I don t know where you are on your journey, and
messages.messageBody:
Yes, Rue's book is available at www.freechild.info; I just ordered 2 more to share--and that won't be enough. I don't know where you are on your journey, and I don't mean I loved it all, but it was a marvelous blessing to me! Sorry about the delay in answering! Cameron

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Rue's book
messages.msgSnippet: Why not just change The to An --I don t think it loses anything with that, and Robyn s point was a good one, I thought. Parenting a Free Child: An
messages.messageBody:
Why not just change "The" to "An"--I don't think it loses anything with
that, and Robyn's point was a good one, I thought.

"Parenting a Free Child: An Unschooled Life" Pretty cool!

Hooray for you, Rue! I can't wait! Do you have a publisher yet? Is
Valerie going to publish it thorugh Ubpub?

~~Danielle
Emily (7), Julia (6), Sam (4.5)
http://www.danielleconger.com/Homeschool/Welcomehome.html

~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*~*

"We are what we think. All that we are arises with our thoughts. With our thoughts, we make the world."
~~Buddha

messages.subject: Rue's book
messages.msgSnippet: ... **Parenting A Free Child: The Unschooled Life. The last part might change - Robyn mentioned (on another list?) not liking the in the title of Buddha
messages.messageBody:
>>but no working title!!

**Parenting A Free Child: The Unschooled Life. The last part might change -
Robyn mentioned (on another list?) not liking 'the' in the title of 'Buddha
Mom: The Path of Mindful Mothering' because it implies there's only one
right way, and I'm thinking about that and want to see what Valerie thinks
too.

I'll work on my plugging skills :0). ~Rue

messages.subject: Rue's book
messages.msgSnippet: ... Yes it is Rue s book. I have my editting copy----but no working title!! Just follow my example, Rue! Anytime you see the words: unschooling, book, writing,
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/26/2005 4:15:42 PM Eastern Standard Time, "Rue Kream" <skreams@...> writes:

>
>>>There's one more unschooling book coming out later this year that is just
>AWESOME---but you'll have to wait for details from the author. <g>
>
>
>**I'm going to be majorly egotistical and assume you're talking about me
><G>.  If I'm right, thanks - if I'm wrong, well, you can all laugh at me
>:0).  I need to take the Kelly Lovejoy learn-how-to-plug-your-______
>(conference, book...) -in-3-easy-lessons funshop before I can start talking
>about it without being prompted!  ~Rue<<<<<



Yes it is Rue's book. I have my editting copy----but no working title!!

Just follow my example, Rue! Anytime you see the words: unschooling, book, writing, words, author----and ANY synonyms of those words, THEN you plug! <BWG>

I'm almost through making my red marks. <g> I'll have it back to you the first of next week.

~Kelly
